        LayoutInline {B} at (0,0) size 542x19

      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,314) size 784x20
        LayoutInline {B} at (0,0) size 58x19

            text run at (0,0) width 58: "Table II:"
        LayoutText {#text} at (57,0) size 387x19
          text run at (57,0) width 387: " introduces rowspan=2 for cells (2,2) and (3,1), which 'overlap'."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,350) size 784x60
        LayoutInline {B} at (0,0) size 64x19
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 64x19
            text run at (0,0) width 64: "Table III:"
        LayoutText {#text} at (63,0) size 784x59
          text run at (63,0) width 715: " is Table II, but cells (2,3),(3,3) and (4,3) now have 'empty' contents; the resulting table is still OK. Note that the height"
          text run at (0,20) width 784: "of (2,3) and (4,3) is determined by cells (2,1) and (4,2) respectively, whereas (3,3) has ~0 height since no 'effective' cell in the row"
          text run at (0,40) width 510: "has any definite height requirement (except for border, margin, padding if applicable)."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,426) size 784x40
        LayoutInline {B} at (0,0) size 62x19
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 62x19
            text run at (0,0) width 62: "Table IV:"
        LayoutText {#text} at (61,0) size 732x39
          text run at (61,0) width 671: " is Table III, but column 3 has been removed (cells (1,3),(2,3),(3,3),(4,3),(5,3)). This should mirror the first two"
          text run at (0,20) width 270: "columns of Table III (but currently does not)."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,482) size 784x40
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 765x39
          text run at (0,0) width 765: "Note that cells (2,2) and (3,1) are still in the correct position, with the same size as Table III, but that their cellspacing with (5,1)"
          text run at (0,20) width 116: "and (4,2) is absent."
